column4: hi whats a music program like itunes that i can use on ubuntu to add and orgranise all my music for me like itunes
if you dont want to do complicated thing rhythmbox might be sufficient. if you like more features, use amarok
amarok offers the most features. if u look for something small that looks like winamp 1.x and has even less features take xmms
dont expect something like that from xmms :))
